article_node.title: Some Pixel owners are getting a more powerful At A Glance widget
article_node.summary: Google's At A Glance widget on Pixel phones is being enhanced with new sports and finance cards, allowing users to see relevant information directly on their home screens. This update follows the recent overhaul known as Gemini Space, which aims to provide more contextual information similar to Samsung's Now Brief. While the specific sports supported are not fully detailed, initial reports include soccer and cricket scores, along with stock information in the finance card.
